## Written by [[Dante]]

The Divine Comedy
- not funny
- has three parts

	1. Inferno
	2. Purgatorio
	3. Paradiso

- written in Italian, not Latin
- Filled with threes
- written as a poem with groups of three

- each part has 33 cantos
- The inferno had 34
- each canto has three lines

- Hell has 3^2 circles
- Purgatory has 3^2 circles
- Paradise has 3^2 circles

- Info from the Bible
	* Church scholars
	* Political people and people from antiquity

- Levels
	* Literal
	* Allegeroical
